Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Simulation

  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all the data and processing of the simulation Has a queue of customers, keeps track of all data relating to the simulation and methods used to manipulate that data

      • Simulation

        public Simulation()

    • Method Detail

      • arrive

        public boolean arrive()
        Adds a customer to the queue if there is a customer being served. Else moves the customer to being served. If the line is too long the customer leaves
        Returns:
        returns true if the customer was added to the queue

      • served

        public Customer served()
        Completes a transaction with the current customer. Updates all the stats and removes customer moving onto the next in queue
        Returns:
        Customer returns the customer that was being served.

      • updateTime

        public boolean updateTime(int deltaTime)
        Handles updating the current time. Updates current time with deltaTime.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - the amount to update current time with
        Returns:
        returns true if current time was updated.

      • numWaiting

        public int numWaiting()
        Handles returning number waiting in queue
        Returns:
        number of customers waiting in queue

      • curTime

        public int curTime()
        Returns the current time in the simulation
        Returns:
        returns current time as int

      • avgWaitTime

        public double avgWaitTime()
        Calculates the average wait time of customers that had to wait
        Returns:
        returns the average wait time of customers that had to wait

      • sumOfWaitTime

        public int sumOfWaitTime()
        Returns sum of the total wait time of customers in queue
        Returns:
        returns sum of the total wait time

      • numOfNoWait

        public int numOfNoWait()
        Returns number of customers that did not have to wait to get served
        Returns:
        the number of customers with no wait

      • numServed

        public int numServed()
        Returns the number of customers served
        Returns:
        number of customers served

      • curServed

        public Customer curServed()
        Returns the current customer being served
        Returns:
        current customer being served

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Testbed main. Has tests to test all constructors and methods. Outputs each test result.
        Parameters:
        args[] - unused.
